sentences.sContent: We are pleased to receive your enquiry.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are pleased to receive your enquiry.
sentences.sCn: 我们很高兴收到您的询问函。

sentences.sContent: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.sContent_eng: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.sCn: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.sContent: When fresh supplies come into the market, we can revert to your enquiry.
sentences.sContent_eng: When fresh supplies come into the market, we can revert to your enquiry.
sentences.sCn: 等新货上市时，我们才能回头考虑你们的询盘。
